# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability, please email security@example.com instead of using the issue tracker.

Please include the following information:

- Description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce
- Potential impact
- Suggested fix (if any)

We appreciate your responsible disclosure and will acknowledge receipt of your report within 48 hours.

## Supported Versions

We provide security updates for the latest stable release. Previous versions may not receive security patches.

Version | Supported
---------|----------
3.18.x  | ✓
3.17.x  | Limited
< 3.17  | ✗
